credentials.clientId: Enter the application ID (clientId) of the 'TodoListSPA' application copied from the Azure portal
credentials.tenantId: Enter the ID of your Azure AD tenant copied from the Azure portal

todoListApi.resourceUri: Enter the endpoint for TodoListAPI, e.g. https://localhost:44351/api/todolist
resourceScopes: Enter the API scopes as declared in the app registration 'Expose an API' blade, e.g. api://{clientId}/access_as_user
